import { BrowserRouter } from "react-router-dom" import { Container } from "./styles" import ScrollAnimation from "react-animate-on-scroll" import Illustration from "../../assets/illustration.svg" import { NavHashLink } from "react-router-hash-link" import linkedin from '../../assets/linkedin.svg' import githubIcon from '../../assets/github.svg' import whatsapp from '../../assets/whatsapp.svg' import Hello from '../../assets/Hello.gif' import telegram from '../../assets/telegram.svg' import instagramIcon from '../../assets/instagram.svg' export function Hero() { return (

Hello , I'm

Aditya Patil

Full Stack Developer

2 Years of Experience
